painPoints.title: The trust barrier in crypto transactions
painPoints.description: Crypto payments are final, which can create hesitation for buyers when dealing with new merchants or high-value items.

steps.title: Customer pays with protection
steps.description: Buyer makes payment through checkout with escrow protection enabled.

steps.title: Funds held in smart escrow wallet
steps.description: Payment is held securely for 7 days in a transparent escrow wallet.

steps.title: Merchant sees 'Frozen' status
steps.description: Merchant dashboard shows payment as secured but not yet released.

steps.title: Automatic release after 7 days
steps.description: Funds are automatically released to merchant after the protection period.
